metadata.description:
40-Pages! 

The worlds of medical drama and super-heroes collide to ponder an intriguing question-- what happens when the superhuman become sick or injured? Sometimes you need special equipment. Sometimes you need advanced training. And sometimes you need super-powers of your own. Dr. Wayne leads a motley crew of devoted doctors in the Metahuman Emergency Department and Intensive Care Unit. His decisions aren't always popular, but he knows what must be done to keep the heroes safe so they can live to save the world another day.
metadata.name: MetaDocs
